messages.text:
On 2011/05/13 02:10:50, dsymonds wrote:
> Erm, check out my http://codereview.appspot.com/4534047/ that I sent
> out a couple of days ago.

Whoops! Must have missed it. :D  Yours looks much cleaner.

Cheers,
Ross Light

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Erm, check out my http://codereview.appspot.com/4534047/ that I sent
out a couple of days ago.

On Thu, May 12, 2011 at 7:15 PM,  <rlight2@gmail.com> wrote:

> Whoops! Must have missed it. :D  Yours looks much cleaner.

Okay, cool. Feel free to drop some comments on it, and maybe give it a LGTM.
Let's try to get it checked in soon so we can iterate on it.


Dave.

http://codereview.appspot.com/4517060/diff/4003/misc/vim/indent/go.vim
File misc/vim/indent/go.vim (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/4517060/diff/4003/misc/vim/indent/go.vim#newcode62
misc/vim/indent/go.vim:62: 
Have better to add checking multi-line string like below.

   foo := `
bar
`

add following into this point.
---------------------
    if synIDattr(synID(a:lnum, 1, 1), "name") == 'goRawString'
        return 0
    endif
---------------------

subject: code review 4517060: misc/vim: improved indent script
